ovdesc.p: Live file for holding details of unsettled transactions and the contra settlement record in
the original security for a Stock Conversion event

desc.p: Flag to indicate if Diary is processed under Actual Settlement or not.
Holds the value of the field SEC.HOLD.SETTLE from DIARY record.
Portfolio for which entitlement is created.
Flag to indicate the Reversal if Entitlement record is reversed.
Record key containing
Entitlement id '*' Transaction Ref incase the record holds detail of unsettled transactions.
or
The Contra Settlement Record id if the records holds the contra settlement record detail.
Unsettled nominal for the customer in the underlying transaction.
Flag to indicate that the record is already processed to avoid the same record getting selected for processing next time.
Flag to indicate that the record is already processed to avoid the same record getting selected for processing next time.
Settled nominal(out of the unsettled nominal in the CU.NOM.OUTSTAND field) for the customer in the underlying transaction.
Unsettled nominal for the broker in the underlying transaction for the specific customer for whom entitlement is created.
(Associated multivalue - fields BROKER to CASH.SETTLED)
Settled nominal (out of the unsettled nominals in the NOM.OUTSTAND field) for the broker in the underlying transaction for the specific customer for whom entitlement is created.
(Associated multivalue - fields BROKER to CASH.SETTLED)
Settled cash(out of the unsettled cash in the CU.CASH.OUTSTAND field) for the customer
in the underlying transaction.
Broker ID (Associated multivalue - fields BROKER to CASH.SETTLED)
Unsettled amount for the broker in the underlying trade for the specific customer
for whom entitlement is created.
(Associated multivalue - fields BROKER to CASH.SETTLED)
Settled cash (out of the unsettled cash in the CASH.OUTSTAND field) for the broker
in the underlying transaction for the specific customer for whom entitlement is created.
(Associated multivalue - fields BROKER to CASH.SETTLED)
Unsettled cash for the customer in the underlying transaction.
